info.description: FITS (Flexible IT Training System) Backend API for managing students, teachers, and signing requests with full authentication
info.title: FITS Backend API

post.description: Create invitation link for student or teacher (Admin only)
Authenticate with username and password, returns access and refresh tokens
Logout user by invalidating all refresh tokens
Get a new access token using a refresh token
Generates admin RSA keypair and returns admin token. Can only be called once.
Complete user registration with username and password

get.description: Retrieve all pending sign requests as a parquet file

200.description: Parquet file with pending sign requests

post.description: Upload a parquet file containing signed requests
Upload a parquet file containing student data

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of students. Supports page and limit query parameters.
Default: page=1, limit=20. Maximum limit is 100 to prevent performance issues.

200.description: Paginated list of students with metadata

post.description: Creates a new student record. Requires admin role. Email must be unique.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific student by their UUID. Public endpoint.

put.description: Updates an existing student's information. Requires admin role. Supports partial updates.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a student from the system (soft delete). Requires admin role.

get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of teachers. Supports page and limit query parameters.
Default: page=1, limit=20. Maximum limit is 100 to prevent performance issues.

200.description: Paginated list of teachers with metadata

post.description: Creates a new teacher record. Requires admin role. Email must be unique. Department is required.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific teacher by their UUID. Public endpoint.

put.description: Updates an existing teacher's information. Requires admin role. Supports partial updates including department changes.

delete.description: Permanently deletes a teacher from the system (soft delete). Requires admin role.

internal_domain_student.CreateStudentReq.description: Request body for creating a new student

internal_domain_student.UpdateStudentReq.description: Request body for updating a student

internal_domain_teacher.CreateTeacherReq.description: Request body for creating a new teacher

internal_domain_teacher.UpdateTeacherReq.description: Request body for updating a teacher
